dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: SBR cover; Butadiene rubber seal; Styrene rubber sealing; Synthetic rubber cover; SBR sealing cap
SBR cover; Butadiene rubber seal; Styrene rubber sealing; Synthetic rubber cover; SBR sealing cap
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow refers to a sealing cover made from Styrene-butadiene rubber, detailing its manufacturing process, quality standards it adheres to, any treatments it has undergone, its compliance with industry standards, usage information including its application, production route starting from styrene and butadiene as educts, and its status as either part of a production mix or a consumption mix. Furthermore, it indicates the point in the distribution chain it is available at, such as available to consumer or at the manufacturing plant, with all details provided comma-separated.
该产品流是指由丁苯橡胶制成的密封盖，详细说明了其制造工艺、遵循的质量标准、经历的任何处理、行业标准的符合性、包括其应用在内的使用信息、从苯乙烯和丁二烯作为原料出发的生产路线，以及它是生产混合物还是消费混合物的一部分。此外，它还指出了产品在分销链中的可用位置，如向消费者提供或在制造工厂，所有详细信息均以逗号分隔。
dataSetInformation.sumFormula: C6H5CH=CH2+n(CH2=CH−CH=CH2) [Note: This is a generalized formula for styrene-butadiene copolymers]
